    • Constructor Detail

      • FileResourceService

        public FileResourceService(Map<String,String> partitionData,
                           Map<String,String> partitionUrls,
                           CuratorFramework curator,
                           Producer<String,String> producer,
                           EventService notifications,
                           Supplier<String> idSupplier,
                           Boolean async)
                    throws IOException
        Create a File-based repository service
        Parameters:
        partitionData - the partition data configuration
        partitionUrls - the partition URL configuration
        curator - the curator framework
        producer - the kafka producer
        notifications - the notification service
        idSupplier - an identifier supplier for new resources
        async - generate cached resources asynchronously if true, synchonously if false
        Throws:
        IOException - if the directory is not writable

      • compact

        public Stream<IRI> compact(IRI identifier,
                           Instant from,
                           Instant until)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceService
        Compact (i.e. remove the history) of a resource
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        from - a time after which a resource is to be compacted
        until - a time before which a resource is to be compacted
        Returns:
        a stream of binary IRIs that can be safely purged
